Command *renew*
****************

Documentation for the renew command in */trans/cmds/renew.c*.

Command
=======

Usage: ``renew <object>``

Takes the specified cloned object, dests it, updates its base
file (NOT its inherits), reclones it and replaces it to its
original environment.

.. TAGS: RST
